snippet.title: Your guide to this year's Ekka
snippet.content: DISCOVER the best of the Ekka with The Courier-Mail's exclusive Ekka Guide on Wednesday August 9. Plan your day at the 140th Show with 10 daily diaries detailing each day's events - whether you're into competitions and displays or entertainment, fashion and food. And navigate your way around the grounds with a full page colour map of attractions. Find out what's new at the Ekka and save big with two full pages of Ekka discount coupons. Celebrate 140 years of the Show with the Ekka's top ten milestone moments and, of course, choose the best of showbag of all using your complete guide.
